QuestData.Title: The Sparring Arena
QuestData.Description: We owe you our freedom, and more. I have spoken to the others, we are willing to return with you to your garrison and teach those pitiful creatures you call "soldiers" how to properly fight.$b$bWe will also do our best to impart our knowledge to you, Commander. Should you have need of us when in the wilds of Gorgrond, simply call us.$b$bYou may wish to warn Rangari Jonaa of our coming.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rangari Jonaa at Highpass in Gorgrond.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Rangari Jonaa at Highpass in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that we have the trainers, we can start training your forces to do something other than chop lumber. Heh heh.
